title: Action SciFi Music
description: 11 Seamlessly Loopable Action SciFi Music with unique themes with a modern chiptune inspired sound pallet.
longDescription:
Preview: soundcloud.com/mateus-polati/action-scifi-music-pack

Fifteen powerful and unique music scores, perfect for use in science fiction genres. Dramatic, full of energy and expressive melodies. They tie the whole game with a immersive and one of a kind musical experience.

Pack Contains:

01) Main Theme [0.31]
02) Menu {Loop} [0.52]
03) Menu Variation {Loop} [0.30]
04) Level Theme 1 {Loop} [1.00]
05) Level Theme 2 {Loop} [1.00]
06) Level Theme 3 {Loop}[1.00]
07) Level Theme 4 {Loop} [1.00]
08) Level Theme 5 {Loop} [1.00]
09) Boss Theme {Loop} [1.00]
10) Select Stage Theme {Loop} [0.14]
11) Credits Theme {Loop} [0.30]
12) Highscore [0.04]
13) Victory Theme [0.06]
14) Failure Theme [0.12]
15) Greater Victory Theme [0.12]

Hit me up with questions or suggestions to help you find the perfect music for your game.
Hope you enjoy :D

Background image taken from Sparth
technicalDetails:
Format: wav - stereo, 44.1kHz, 16bit
Number of audio tracks: 15
Number of music tracks: 11
Does music loop: Yes
Intended Platform: All Platforms
Platforms Tested: OSX
